item.title: [Release] View other players stats
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Added it so you can hide (::hidestats) and show (::showstats) your statsfrom public. Default is set to show, but incase you’re a PKer or Staker with stats you don’t want people to see, you have the ability to easily hide them. Admins can still look even if they are hidden however.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] View other players stats
item.dc:creator: @Nuk Nuk
item.description:
@Nuk wrote:

My code:

if (cmd.equals("showstats")) {
		long PlayerHash = DataConversions.usernameToHash(args[0]);
		Player p = world.getPlayer(PlayerHash);
		int finalStat;
		if (player.isAdmin()) {
		    finalStat = 0;
		} else {
		    finalStat = 3;
		}
		if (p != null) {
		    String message = "";
		    for (int i = 15; i >= finalStat; i--) {
			if (i != 5 && i != 6) {
			    message = "@red@" + Formulae.statArray[i]
				    + " @whi@" + p.getMaxStat(i) + " - "
				    + message;
			} else if (player.isAdmin()) {
			    message = "@red@" + Formulae.statArray[i]
				    + " @whi@" + p.getMaxStat(i) + " - "
				    + message;
			}
		    }
		    message = p.getUsername() + "'s stats: " + message;
		    player.getActionSender().sendAlert(message, false);
		} else {
		    player.getActionSender().sendMessage(
			    "@whi@Invalid player or not online");
		}
		return;
	    }

Read full topic

Please make sure they are online!"); return; } [/quote]

item.title: [Release] View other players stats
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

if(cmd.equals("stats")) {
			Player p = world.getPlayer(DataConversions.usernameToHash(args[0]));
			if(p != null) {
				String str = "@gre@Stats for " + p.getUsername() + ": @whi@";
				for(int i=0; i < Formulae.statArray.length; i++)
					str += Formulae.statArray[i] + ": " + p.getMaxStat(i) + ", ";			
				player.getActionSender().sendAlert(str.substring(0, str.length() - 2), false);
			} else 
				player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Invalid player. Please make sure they are online!");
			return;
		}

item.title: [Release] View other players stats
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

CommandHandler.java

[code] if(cmd.equals(“stats”)) {
long PlayerHash = DataConversions.usernameToHash(args[0]);
Player p = world.getPlayer(PlayerHash);
if(p != null) {
String attack = "Attack: " + p.getMaxStat(0);
String defense = ", Defense: " + p.getMaxStat(1);
String strength = ", Strength: " + p.getMaxStat(2);
String hits = ", Hits: " + p.getMaxStat(3);
String ranged = ", Ranged: " + p.getMaxStat(4);
String prayer = ", Prayer: " + p.getMaxStat(5);
String magic = ", Magic: " + p.getMaxStat(6);
String cooking = ", Cooking: " + p.getMaxStat(7);
String woodcut = ", Woodcut: " + p.getMaxStat(8);
String fletching = ", Fletching: " + p.getMaxStat(9);
String fishing = ", Fishing: " + p.getMaxStat(10);
String firemaking = ", Firemaking: " + p.getMaxStat(11);
String crafting = ", Crafting: " + p.getMaxStat(12);
String smithing = ", Smithing: " + p.getMaxStat(13);
String mining = ", Mining: " + p.getMaxStat(14);
String herblaw = ", Herblaw: " + p.getMaxStat(15);
String agility = ", Agility: " + p.getMaxStat(16);
String thieving = “, Thieving: " + p.getMaxStat(17);
String total = “, Skill Total: " + p.getSkillTotal();
String kills = " @red@Kills: " + p.getKills();
String deaths = " and @red@Deaths: " + p.getDeaths();
player.getActionSender().sendAlert(”@gre@” + p.getUsername() + “'s Stats: @whi@” + attack + defense +

strength + hits + ranged + prayer + magic + cooking + woodcut + fletching + fishing + firemaking + crafting +

smithing + mining + herblaw + agility + thieving + total + ". " + kills + deaths + “.”, false);
} else {
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“Invalid player. Please make sure they are online!”);
}
return;
}[/code]

Just type ::stats while he/she is online.
Flame away

Read full topic
